d52ff397-9cbc-4270-b649-fe4b6a7a2672.name: 视力不良（远视）
d52ff397-9cbc-4270-b649-fe4b6a7a2672.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

31099b83-ad5a-41bb-a345-68ba94240eaf.name: 视力不良（近视）
31099b83-ad5a-41bb-a345-68ba94240eaf.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

a088835f-7ca8-4245-8497-79264345ab8d.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

598b58fb-ac59-419a-a7c0-dc129629888d.name: 可选增益
598b58fb-ac59-419a-a7c0-dc129629888d.notes: Roll appropriate skill to scrounge equipment for other covered skills and apply level against the penalty.  Shift rolls to avoid ill effects from mysterious artifacts by level in either direction.

3852ec9c-267d-475a-ade9-f652fb336399.name: Equipment Bond
3852ec9c-267d-475a-ade9-f652fb336399.notes: You have a tool particularly suited to you for +1 to skill rolls using it.

b1fb770d-f508-4615-a413-d3a6607f91e9.name: 幸运
b1fb770d-f508-4615-a413-d3a6607f91e9.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

93724c51-bcc2-41d7-9ca0-d645597d5ba5.name: Luck, Extraordinary
93724c51-bcc2-41d7-9ca0-d645597d5ba5.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

aae2760e-1f95-433b-8900-791a53170dbd.name: 标志性装备
aae2760e-1f95-433b-8900-791a53170dbd.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

c90a6b09-94a6-4d2e-af69-37cbb29015fc.name: 特化
c90a6b09-94a6-4d2e-af69-37cbb29015fc.notes: @一 纲生物（如“哺乳类”或“鸟类”）@

9f774e51-4ece-4f95-be92-e46e0142b567.name: 特化
9f774e51-4ece-4f95-be92-e46e0142b567.notes: @一科生物（如“猫科动物”或“鹦鹉科动物”）@

ce783527-4785-4fd8-8192-504363d67d7d.name: 特化
ce783527-4785-4fd8-8192-504363d67d7d.notes: @一种生物（如“家猫”或“金刚鹦鹉”）@

0501399c-bd41-4416-a0e5-194b65357bfe.name: 1 point to raise one of those skills by a level; or 1 point for an additional primary skill choice at one level lower.

4a181e9a-3d97-4b63-b4e0-a4a2f73a675d.name: Either spend 4 points to improve the previous skill to 13, or select two of

bb1bd7e9-51a6-4422-b4e7-d99f06166585.name: or 2 points to raise one of those skills by a level.

c773f763-3c9c-48f4-9a74-c5567f45fc5e.name: or 2 points to raise any primary skill by one level.
